description:
Powerful desktop PDF solution to create and edit PDF documents and integrate with Foxit eSign.


New Features and Improvements in Foxit PDF Editor Subscription Release 2024.4.0.27683
- New features and enhancements for AI Assistant
  - Update the GPT model to GPT-4o mini for improved intelligence and capabilities.
  - Provide more smart PDF commands.
- Save or import document metadata (the document information such as the documentâ€™s title, author, and keywords) in XMP format, making it easier to share metadata among different documents.
- Allow end users to upgrade Foxit PDF Editor without requiring admin rights.
- Enterprise admins can set a domain whitelist or blacklist using GPO templates or Foxit Customization Wizard to restrict end users with specific email addresses from allowed domains from logging into the application.
- Other enhancements to the user experience.
Issues Addressed in Foxit PDF Editor Subscription Release 2024.4.0.27683
- Fixed some security and stability issues. Click here for details.
